rules_text:
Whenever Chittering Burrower deals combat damage to a player, muse 1. [i](Choose a counter on another permanent you control or a card you own in in exile. Remove it or add another.)[/i]
Whenever Chittering Burrower is put into exile from anywhere, create a 1/1 white Squirrel creature token with  “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, muse 1.”
